explains: n. （尤指自尊心受损而引起的）恼怒，愤恨；凹凸织物；（皮克牌用语）30比0
vt. 使愤恨，使恼怒；激起（兴趣，好奇心）； 赢（某人）三十分
wordGroup: out of pique 由于反感(或忿怒)

sentences.en: She went off in a fit of pique.
Mimi had got over her pique at Susan's refusal to accept the job.
sentences.cn: 米米已经不再因苏珊拒绝这份工作而生气了。

sentences.en: When he realized nobody was listening to him, he left in a fit of pique.
sentences.cn: 他发觉无人理睬他的话，就愤然离去。
